title: Xayah originally called Rayah?
body:
Just a little thing I found, while inspecting element on the reveal page for our two newest lovebirds, I found that the renders on the page are both listed under the name of Rayah instead of Xayah.

I thought this might have just been a cute little ship name Riot might have put in place when naming the image files, but Rakan's renders are listed simply as, well, Rakan...

So it just had me thinking that maybe Xayah was originally going to be called Rayah?

replies.body: Maybe that was her name before she joined Organisation XIII?
######On a side note, my hype for kh3 is getting to be too much to bear
nope.   She did have a "working title"  That was probably a typo.
Out of curiosity, do you know what Xayah and Rakan's working titles where, and if so, could you share them? I always like seeing those little tidbits of trivia!
Well you see {{champion:101}} and {{champion:163}} had a baby and named him after themselves.
Everytime I see Xayah name, I imagine either Taliyah or Xerath. It is like I almost get excited since It will be a Shurima discussion.
Goddamn you, Xerath doing it really isn't the kind of mental image I wanted to have...

> [{quoted}](name=Limmie,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=cvmXGo60,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-04-07T01:45:29.465+0000)
>
> Goddamn you, Xerath doing it really isn't the kind of mental image I wanted to have...

Blue with lightning bolts.

*shivers*
Funny enough I made an OC named Rayah that was meant to be their lovechild in an alternate universe {{sticker:sg-lux}}
